resources.string: All the Payments/Identification numbers are generated using what is called a Checksum, so these Checksum Algorithms can be reversed and it can be determined whether the entered number is genuine or not.
Checksum Algorithms used in this Application: Luhn\'s Mod 10 Algorithms Verhoff\'s Algorithms Java Hash Code
Checksum Algorithms used in this Application:\\n Luhn\'s Mod 10 Algorithm\\n Verhoff\'s Algorithms\\n Java Hash Code
Any detail you enter in this application will never be sent anywhere else.
